0 01111100 10000000000000000000000
V: +
C: 01111100 = 64 + 32 + 16 + 8 + 4 - 127 = -3
M: 0,110000000000000000000000 * 2^(-2)

0 01111101 01000000000000000000000
V: +
C: 01111101 = 64 + 32 + 16 + 8 + 4 + 1 - 127 = -2
M: 1,01000000000000000000000 * 2^(-2)


 0,11000000000000000000000 +
 1,01000000000000000000000 =
10,00000000000000000000000


Ergebnis:
V: +
C: 01111110 = -1
M: 1,00000000000000000000000 * 2^(-1)
0 01111110 00000000000000000000000
